xml:
Modified-release capsule
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 21 - Take with or just after food, or a meal

Label 25 - Swallow this medicine whole. Do not chew or crush

Label 32 - Contains aspirin. Do not take anything else containing aspirin while taking this medicine

Asasantin Retard capsules <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Boehringer Ingelheim Ltd)</ph> 3292511000001108

Aspirin 25 mg

Dipyridamole 200 mg

  • 60 capsule POM

    NHS indicative price = £9.84

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £9.84

    NHS indicative price = £16.40

  • 100 capsule POM
